code:

```python
import pytest

def test_spec_guided_single_element(numbers=[1]):
    res = candidate(numbers)
    expected_res = numbers
    assert isinstance(res, list)
    assert len(res) == len(numbers)
    assert res[0] == numbers[0]
    assert all(res[i] >= res[i - 1] for i in range(1, len(res)))
    assert all(res[i] == max(numbers[:i+1]) for i in range(len(numbers)))

def test_spec_guided_increasing_sequence(numbers=[1, 2, 3, 4]):
    res = candidate(numbers)
    expected_res = numbers
    assert isinstance(res, list)
    assert len(res) == len(numbers)
    assert res[0] == numbers[0]
    assert all(res[i] >= res[i - 1] for i in range(1, len(res)))
    assert all(res[i] == max(numbers[:i+1]) for i in range(len(numbers)))

def test_spec_guided_non_increasing_sequence(numbers=[4, 3, 2, 1]):
    res = candidate(numbers)
    expected_res = sorted(numbers, reverse=True)
    assert isinstance(res, list)
    assert len(res) == len(numbers)
    assert res[0] == expected_res[0]
    assert all(res[i] >= res[i - 1] for i in range(1, len(res)))
    assert all(res[i] == max(expected_res[:i+1]) for i in range(len(expected_res)))

def test_spec_guided_equal_elements(numbers=[1, 1, 1, 1]):
    res = candidate(numbers)
    expected_res = sorted(numbers, reverse=True)
    assert isinstance(res, list)
    assert len(res) == len(numbers)
    assert res[0] == expected_res[0]
    assert all(res[i] >= res[i - 1] for i in range(1, len(res)))
    assert all(res[i] == max(expected_res[:i+1]) for i in range(len(expected_res)))

def test_spec_guided_empty_list(numbers=[]):
    res = candidate(numbers)
    expected_res = []
    assert isinstance(res, list)
    assert len(res) == len(numbers)
    assert res == expected_res
    assert all(res[i] >= res[i - 1] for i in range(1, len(res)))
    assert all(res[i] == max(expected_res[:i+1]) for i in range(len(expected_res)))
```
